X

XIGamepad - Class in de.ralleytn.simple.input
Represents a gamepad that uses the XInput API.
XIGamepadAdapter - Class in de.ralleytn.simple.input
Implements the XIGamepadListener interface.
XIGamepadAdapter() - Constructor for class de.ralleytn.simple.input.XIGamepadAdapter
 
XIGamepadButtonMapping - Class in de.ralleytn.simple.input.internal
Maps the JInput identifiers to the SimpleInput constants.
XIGamepadEvent - Class in de.ralleytn.simple.input
Represents an event that was fired by a gamepad that uses the XInput API.
XIGamepadEvent(Device, Direction, int, int, float, int) - Constructor for class de.ralleytn.simple.input.XIGamepadEvent
 
XIGamepadEvent(Device, int, boolean) - Constructor for class de.ralleytn.simple.input.XIGamepadEvent
Constructor for GamepadListener.onButtonPress(GamepadEvent) and GamepadListener.onButtonRelease(GamepadEvent)
XIGamepadEvent(Device, int, float) - Constructor for class de.ralleytn.simple.input.XIGamepadEvent
Constructor for XIGamepadListener.onTriggerPush(XIGamepadEvent).
XIGamepadListener - Interface in de.ralleytn.simple.input
An extended GamepadListener that provides full support for the triggers on XInput gamepads.
XIMouseControl - Class in de.ralleytn.simple.input
An extended MouseControl that will invert up and down cursor movement.
